[griddy-sdk](../globals.md) / matchStatusCodes

# Function: matchStatusCodes()

> **matchStatusCodes**(`errorCodes`, `statusCode`): `boolean`

Defined in: [src/griddy/nfl/\_constants.ts:44](https://github.com/jkgriebel93/griddy-sdk-typescript/blob/1475708206aa33d5e89f3e369e1f3a5b6b36db48/src/griddy/nfl/_constants.ts#L44)

Check if a status code matches any of the error codes.
Supports wildcards like '4XX' and '5XX'.

## Parameters

### errorCodes

`string`[]

### statusCode

`number`

## Returns

`boolean`
